mapper.select: SELECT CI.CUSTOMER_ID AS LOGIN_USER_ID, CI.PHONE_NO, CI.NAME, PI.PASSWORD, PI.USER_TYPE_ID as ROLE_ID FROM customer_info CI LEFT JOIN password_info PI ON CI.CUSTOMER_ID = PI.USER_ID WHERE PI.USER_TYPE_ID = 3 AND CI.PHONE_NO = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CI.DEL_FLAG = 0
SELECT UT.USR_TYPE AS ROLE FROM user_type UT JOIN PASSWORD_INFO PI ON UT.USER_TYPE_ID = PI.USER_TYPE_ID WHERE PI.USER_TYPE_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
